name: Catbaryo (Early Demo)
description:
Here's a very early demo of my first public game. I've been having many bizarre game ideas over the years as i slowly learned game development, and here i decided to combine them all in the context of one big abstract platformer, starring a sentient proton shaped like a cat's head who lives in a corrupted simulation.

For now the game is very rough - there's only one gigantic level with a few locations from the abovementioned games embedded into it, as well as some original content. Let me know what you think, and stay tuned for more if you like it!

The soundtrack is by Fever, a great friend of mine.
